extendedInfo.description: Anything can happen in THE GAME OF LIFE! Play with up to 3 friends as you navigate animated tokens through winding roads and lush landscapes with easy touch controls. Live on the edge or play it safe. LIFE is better than ever on Android!**GAME ALERT** Play The Simpsonsâ¢: Tapped Out. THIS GAME IS LIFE-RUININGLY FUN! Create your own living, breathing Springfield for free! http://bit.ly/YynjyUPASS âN PLAYShare THE GAME OF LIFE with up to 3 friends on one device. MAKE CHOICES, GET PAID, OR LOSE IT ALLLand on âLife Spacesâ and gain tiles worth big bucks â or pay huge fines. Collect âShare the Wealth Cardsâ and retire in style.Enjoy endless hours of replay fun and re-create your LIFE each time you play!Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: The game of life
reviews.comment: Not bad at all! Great game. Definitely worth the price. (Not all phones work with all apps..) Thank you E.A. games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: lies
reviews.comment: The app should say what phones and devices that its compatible with because i wouldnt have downloaded it and it seems most everyone with samsung device is havn problems. This is a scam to the many of us that cant play the game . Ridiculous i wouldnt even rate it 1 star but have to in order to post this
reviews.author: christal profit

reviews.title: Need a list of compatible devices!!!!
reviews.comment: I buy this THEN it tells me I can\'t play it on my phone. A list of what devices this works on would be NICE.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it except....
reviews.comment: I wish that u can play online with friends as an option. This would be a awesome!!! The pass n play is great should still be a feature.  Then I would rate it a 5. Also, why do the players pay for kids when they don\'t have any?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I\'ll play it whenever I\'m bored, but its a great game. And I don\'t have any problems with the Nexus 7!!
reviews.author: Nick3653 .

reviews.title: Can\'t believe it.
reviews.comment: I used to love this game but I am about to uninstall it cause I can\'t see anything! I would like a upgrade on this app to fix this problem cause I really liked this game. A shame really.
reviews.author: Kyrie Johnson

reviews.title: Lots of fun!  Super in depth!
reviews.comment: If you like the game of Life, you WILL love this version.  Wish we had more character choices, though.  None of them look even REMOTELY like me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Application not authorized for device.
reviews.comment: So after buying and downloading for my Galaxy Note 2, I cannot play the game. Even after the Play Store verified it would work, the game insists it won\'t. Also cannot refund purchase. Really upset at EA and the Play Store for essentially stealing my money.
reviews.author: Adam Greaser

reviews.title: At first it was great..
reviews.comment: When I first bought this app it worked fine. It then started to not load up and the screen would just turn blue and stay that way. I went to check the app info and it now says the app isn\'t compatible with my phone. I just \'love\' how it didn\'t say that when I bought it.
reviews.author: Sarah Carlson

reviews.title: Done right...
reviews.comment: ... and animations, and gameplay are smooth.   Great job EA, keep the updates coming.   Stuff for each holiday maybe, plus a multiplayer setup would be sweet.   Love the classics.  Oh, and it does work on Samsungs.   I have  T-Mobile Samsung Galaxy Note 2, just saying.   Test, and learn...don\'t bad mark a game.   Email customer support first.
reviews.author: Michael R Wilson

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Great fun I love that you can play with more than one person. I love the board game and the app is great. I strongly recommend it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just Like The Board Game!
reviews.comment: I love this, so worth the $1! I\'ve always loved this game on the computer as well! However, I do think u should be able to personalize your characters name & children\'. Also their should be more characters to choose from! Other than that great graphics & all around great game!
reviews.author: Tabatha H

reviews.title: WTH NEVER LOADS!!!!
reviews.comment: I have now bought this game not ONCE but TWICE!!!! It never loads! Waste of time and MONEY. If I had a choice to put NO stars I WOULD!!!!!
reviews.author: Rachel Wendt

reviews.title: Bought for samsung galaxy s3.
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work... All I see are lines and colors. Hopefully it gets fixed soon. I want to play!
reviews.author: Michael Magoon

reviews.title: Love but.....
reviews.comment: Loving this game. It is fun, but it would be more fun if it could be personalized
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: fantastic
reviews.comment: Love it amazing graphics fast play great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My New Favorite!
reviews.comment: Used to love the board game, so this was a prize. Now it\'s my favorite \"time waster\". Beautiful graphics, fun to play! Definitely recommended!
reviews.author: Sparkle Frederick

reviews.title: Reminds me of when I was a kid!
reviews.comment: Works great on my phone and the graphics are amazing! I can\'t wait to pass on this tradition, though in a different form,  to my daughter!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SAMSUNG OWNERS BEWARE!!
reviews.comment: DOES NOT RUN on my Samsung Galaxy Note 2.  Others with Samsung devices are having the same issue.  That\'s just bad business.  It\'s only fair that Samsung owners RECEIVE A REFUND PLEASE.
reviews.author: Rocky Baroli

reviews.title: Update or refund!
reviews.comment: This use to play on my S3 Galaxy, but not anymore. I thought this was a recent problem and didn\'t mind, hoping for an update to fix it, but I\'ve read other reviews that it\'s been this way for months. Seems unfair since people paid for the game. :c
reviews.author: Vic D.
